allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Complete Gweta RAG data quality framework - Phases 1-5

Phase 1 - Core Foundation:
- Chunk dataclass and QualityReport types
- ChunkValidator with density and coherence scoring
- ChromaStore vector store adapter
- CLI with validate, crawl, ingest, health, serve commands

Phase 2 - Acquisition Layer:
- GwetaCrawler wrapping Crawl4AI
- PDFExtractor with table extraction
- DatabaseSource with SQL safety
- APIClient for REST endpoints
- Sitemap and RSS fetchers

Phase 3 - MCP Server:
- FastMCP-based server with stdio/HTTP transports
- 10 MCP tools for AI agent integration
- 4 MCP resources and 3 prompts

Phase 4 - Intelligence Layer:
- DomainRuleEngine with YAML-based validation rules
- GoldenDatasetRunner for retrieval quality testing
- Qdrant, Pinecone, Weaviate store adapters
- Comprehensive test suite \(163 tests\)

Phase 5 - Polish & Launch:
- Documentation \(getting-started, architecture, API reference\)
- Full pipeline example
- CHANGELOG for version tracking

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
